ä¸Šä¸€èŠ‚è¯¾ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å­¦ä¹ äº†æ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼çš„åŸç†ã€å®ç°å’Œåº”ç”¨ã€‚å®ƒå¸¸ç”¨åœ¨æ¡†æ¶å¼€å‘ä¸­ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æä¾›åŠŸèƒ½æ‰©å±•ç‚¹ï¼Œè®©æ¡†æ¶ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨ä¸ä¿®æ”¹æ¡†æ¶æºç çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼ŒåŸºäºæ‰©å±•ç‚¹å®šåˆ¶åŒ–æ¡†æ¶çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚é™¤æ­¤ä¹‹å¤–ï¼Œæ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼è¿˜å¯ä»¥èµ·åˆ°ä»£ç å¤ç”¨çš„ä½œç”¨ã€‚

å¤ç”¨å’Œæ‰©å±•æ˜¯æ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼çš„ä¸¤å¤§ä½œç”¨ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰å¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ€æœ¯æ¦‚å¿µï¼Œä¹Ÿèƒ½èµ·åˆ°è·Ÿæ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼ç›¸åŒçš„ä½œç”¨ï¼Œé‚£å°±æ˜¯å›è°ƒï¼ˆCallbackï¼‰ã€‚ä»Šå¤©æˆ‘ä»¬ä»Šå¤©å°±æ¥çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå›è°ƒçš„åŸç†ã€å®ç°å’Œåº”ç”¨ï¼Œä»¥åŠå®ƒè·Ÿæ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼çš„åŒºåˆ«å’Œè”ç³»ã€‚

è¯ä¸å¤šè¯´ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä»¬æ­£å¼å¼€å§‹ä»Šå¤©çš„å­¦ä¹ å§ï¼

å›è°ƒçš„åŸç†è§£æ

ç›¸å¯¹äºæ™®é€šçš„å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨æ¥è¯´ï¼Œå›è°ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç§åŒå‘è°ƒç”¨å…³ç³»ã€‚Aç±»äº‹å…ˆæ³¨å†ŒæŸä¸ªå‡½æ•°Fåˆ°Bç±»ï¼ŒAç±»åœ¨è°ƒç”¨Bç±»çš„På‡½æ•°çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼ŒBç±»åè¿‡æ¥è°ƒç”¨Aç±»æ³¨å†Œç»™å®ƒçš„Få‡½æ•°ã€‚è¿™é‡Œçš„Få‡½æ•°å°±æ˜¯â€œå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°â€ã€‚Aè°ƒç”¨Bï¼ŒBåè¿‡æ¥åˆè°ƒç”¨Aï¼Œè¿™ç§è°ƒç”¨æœºåˆ¶å°±å«ä½œâ€œå›è°ƒâ€ã€‚

Aç±»å¦‚ä½•å°†å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ä¼ é€’ç»™Bç±»å‘¢ï¼Ÿä¸åŒçš„ç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸åŒçš„å®ç°æ–¹æ³•ã€‚Cè¯­è¨€å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å‡½æ•°æŒ‡é’ˆï¼ŒJavaåˆ™éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨åŒ…è£¹äº†å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°çš„ç±»å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ç®€ç§°ä¸ºå›è°ƒå¯¹è±¡ã€‚è¿™é‡Œæˆ‘ç”¨Javaè¯­è¨€ä¸¾ä¾‹è¯´æ˜ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

public interface ICallback {
  void methodToCallback();
}

public class BClass {
  public void process(ICallback callback) {
    //...
    callback.methodToCallback();
    //...
  }
}

public class AClass {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    BClass b = new BClass();
    b.process(new ICallback() { //å›è°ƒå¯¹è±¡
      @Override
      public void methodToCallback() {
        System.out.println("Call back me.");
      }
    });
  }
}

ä¸Šé¢å°±æ˜¯Javaè¯­è¨€ä¸­å›è°ƒçš„å…¸å‹ä»£ç å®ç°ã€‚ä»ä»£ç å®ç°ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œå›è°ƒè·Ÿæ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œä¹Ÿå…·æœ‰å¤ç”¨å’Œæ‰©å±•çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚é™¤äº†å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ä¹‹å¤–ï¼ŒBClassç±»çš„process()å‡½æ•°ä¸­çš„é€»è¾‘éƒ½å¯ä»¥å¤ç”¨ã€‚å¦‚æœICallbackã€BClassç±»æ˜¯æ¡†æ¶ä»£ç ï¼ŒAClassæ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨æ¡†æ¶çš„å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä»£ç ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ICallbackå®šåˆ¶process()å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ï¼Œæ¡†æ¶å› æ­¤å…·æœ‰äº†æ‰©å±•çš„èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚

å®é™…ä¸Šï¼Œå›è°ƒä¸ä»…å¯ä»¥åº”ç”¨åœ¨ä»£ç è®¾è®¡ä¸Šï¼Œåœ¨æ›´é«˜å±‚æ¬¡çš„æ¶æ„è®¾è®¡ä¸Šä¹Ÿæ¯”è¾ƒå¸¸ç”¨ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¸‰æ–¹æ”¯ä»˜ç³»ç»Ÿæ¥å®ç°æ”¯ä»˜åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·åœ¨å‘èµ·æ”¯ä»˜è¯·æ±‚ä¹‹åï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬ä¸ä¼šä¸€ç›´é˜»å¡åˆ°æ”¯ä»˜ç»“æœè¿”å›ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯æ³¨å†Œå›è°ƒæ¥å£ï¼ˆç±»ä¼¼å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå›è°ƒç”¨çš„URLï¼‰ç»™ä¸‰æ–¹æ”¯ä»˜ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œç­‰ä¸‰æ–¹æ”¯ä»˜ç³»ç»Ÿæ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆä¹‹åï¼Œå°†ç»“æœé€šè¿‡å›è°ƒæ¥å£è¿”å›ç»™ç”¨æˆ·ã€‚

å›è°ƒå¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºåŒæ­¥å›è°ƒå’Œå¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒï¼ˆæˆ–è€…å»¶è¿Ÿå›è°ƒï¼‰ã€‚åŒæ­¥å›è°ƒæŒ‡åœ¨å‡½æ•°è¿”å›ä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼›å¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯åœ¨å‡½æ•°è¿”å›ä¹‹åæ‰§è¡Œå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ã€‚ä¸Šé¢çš„ä»£ç å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯åŒæ­¥å›è°ƒçš„å®ç°æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåœ¨process()å‡½æ•°è¿”å›ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œå®Œå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°methodToCallback()ã€‚è€Œä¸Šé¢æ”¯ä»˜çš„ä¾‹å­æ˜¯å¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒçš„å®ç°æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå‘èµ·æ”¯ä»˜ä¹‹åä¸éœ€è¦ç­‰å¾…å›è°ƒæ¥å£è¢«è°ƒç”¨å°±ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ã€‚ä»åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ä¸Šæ¥çœ‹ï¼ŒåŒæ­¥å›è°ƒçœ‹èµ·æ¥æ›´åƒæ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒçœ‹èµ·æ¥æ›´åƒè§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼ã€‚

åº”ç”¨ä¸¾ä¾‹ä¸€ï¼šJdbcTemplate

Springæä¾›äº†å¾ˆå¤šTemplateç±»ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ï¼ŒJdbcTemplateã€RedisTemplateã€RestTemplateã€‚å°½ç®¡éƒ½å«ä½œxxxTemplateï¼Œä½†å®ƒä»¬å¹¶éåŸºäºæ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼æ¥å®ç°çš„ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯åŸºäºå›è°ƒæ¥å®ç°çš„ï¼Œç¡®åˆ‡åœ°è¯´åº”è¯¥æ˜¯åŒæ­¥å›è°ƒã€‚è€ŒåŒæ­¥å›è°ƒä»åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ä¸Šå¾ˆåƒæ¨¡æ¿æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œåœ¨å‘½åä¸Šï¼Œè¿™äº›ç±»ä½¿ç”¨Templateï¼ˆæ¨¡æ¿ï¼‰è¿™ä¸ªå•è¯ä½œä¸ºåç¼€ã€‚

è¿™äº›Templateç±»çš„è®¾è®¡æ€è·¯éƒ½å¾ˆç›¸è¿‘ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªæ‹¿å…¶ä¸­çš„JdbcTemplateæ¥ä¸¾ä¾‹åˆ†æä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚å¯¹äºå…¶ä»–Templateç±»ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥é˜…è¯»æºç è‡ªè¡Œåˆ†æã€‚

åœ¨å‰é¢çš„ç« èŠ‚ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿå¤šæ¬¡æåˆ°ï¼ŒJavaæä¾›äº†JDBCç±»åº“æ¥å°è£…ä¸åŒç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œã€‚ä¸è¿‡ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨JDBCæ¥ç¼–å†™æ“ä½œæ•°æ®åº“çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯æœ‰ç‚¹å¤æ‚çš„ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼Œä¸‹é¢è¿™æ®µæ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨JDBCæ¥æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯çš„ä»£ç ã€‚

public class JdbcDemo {
  public User queryUser(long id) {
    Connection conn = null;
    Statement stmt = null;
    try {
      //1.åŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨
      Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
      conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/demo", "xzg", "xzg");

      //2.åˆ›å»ºstatementç±»å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨æ¥æ‰§è¡ŒSQLè¯­å¥
      stmt = conn.createStatement();

      //3.ResultSetç±»ï¼Œç”¨æ¥å­˜æ”¾è·å–çš„ç»“æœé›†
      String sql = "select * from user where id=" + id;
      ResultSet resultSet = stmt.executeQuery(sql);

      String eid = null, ename = null, price = null;

      while (resultSet.next()) {
        User user = new User();
        user.setId(resultSet.getLong("id"));
        user.setName(resultSet.getString("name"));
        user.setTelephone(resultSet.getString("telephone"));
        return user;
      }
    } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
      // TODO: log...
    } catch (SQLException e) {
      // TODO: log...
    } finally {
      if (conn != null)
        try {
          conn.close();
        } catch (SQLException e) {
          // TODO: log...
        }
      if (stmt != null)
        try {
          stmt.close();
        } catch (SQLException e) {
          // TODO: log...
        }
    }
    return null;
  }

}

queryUser()å‡½æ•°åŒ…å«å¾ˆå¤šæµç¨‹æ€§è´¨çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œè·Ÿä¸šåŠ¡æ— å…³ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ï¼ŒåŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨ã€åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ã€åˆ›å»ºstatementã€å…³é—­è¿æ¥ã€å…³é—­statementã€å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸ã€‚é’ˆå¯¹ä¸åŒçš„SQLæ‰§è¡Œè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œè¿™äº›æµç¨‹æ€§è´¨çš„ä»£ç æ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„ã€å¯ä»¥å¤ç”¨çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸éœ€è¦æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½é‡æ–°æ•²ä¸€éã€‚

é’ˆå¯¹è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼ŒSpringæä¾›äº†JdbcTemplateï¼Œå¯¹JDBCè¿›ä¸€æ­¥å°è£…ï¼Œæ¥ç®€åŒ–æ•°æ®åº“ç¼–ç¨‹ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨JdbcTemplateæŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦ç¼–å†™è·Ÿè¿™ä¸ªä¸šåŠ¡æœ‰å…³çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·çš„SQLè¯­å¥ã€æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœä¸Userå¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´çš„æ˜ å°„å…³ç³»ã€‚å…¶ä»–æµç¨‹æ€§è´¨çš„ä»£ç éƒ½å°è£…åœ¨äº†JdbcTemplateç±»ä¸­ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦æˆ‘ä»¬æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½é‡æ–°ç¼–å†™ã€‚æˆ‘ç”¨JdbcTemplateé‡å†™äº†ä¸Šé¢çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼Œä»£ç ç®€å•äº†å¾ˆå¤šï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

public class JdbcTemplateDemo {
  private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

  public User queryUser(long id) {
    String sql = "select * from user where id="+id;
    return jdbcTemplate.query(sql, new UserRowMapper()).get(0);
  }

  class UserRowMapper implements RowMapper<User> {
    public User mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
      User user = new User();
      user.setId(rs.getLong("id"));
      user.setName(rs.getString("name"));
      user.setTelephone(rs.getString("telephone"));
      return user;
    }
  }
}

é‚£JdbcTemplateåº•å±‚å…·ä½“æ˜¯å¦‚ä½•å®ç°çš„å‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹å®ƒçš„æºç ã€‚å› ä¸ºJdbcTemplateä»£ç æ¯”è¾ƒå¤šï¼Œæˆ‘åªæ‘˜æŠ„äº†éƒ¨åˆ†ç›¸å…³ä»£ç ï¼Œè´´åˆ°äº†ä¸‹é¢ã€‚å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒJdbcTemplateé€šè¿‡å›è°ƒçš„æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œå°†ä¸å˜çš„æ‰§è¡Œæµç¨‹æŠ½ç¦»å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œæ”¾åˆ°æ¨¡æ¿æ–¹æ³•execute()ä¸­ï¼Œå°†å¯å˜çš„éƒ¨åˆ†è®¾è®¡æˆå›è°ƒStatementCallbackï¼Œç”±ç”¨æˆ·æ¥å®šåˆ¶ã€‚query()å‡½æ•°æ˜¯å¯¹execute()å‡½æ•°çš„äºŒæ¬¡å°è£…ï¼Œè®©æ¥å£ç”¨èµ·æ¥æ›´åŠ æ–¹ä¾¿ã€‚

@Override
public <T> List<T> query(String sql, RowMapper<T> rowMapper) throws DataAccessException {
 return query(sql, new RowMapperResultSetExtractor<T>(rowMapper));
}

@Override
public <T> T query(final String sql, final ResultSetExtractor<T> rse) throws DataAccessException {
 Assert.notNull(sql, "SQL must not be null");
 Assert.notNull(rse, "ResultSetExtractor must not be null");
 if (logger.isDebugEnabled()) {
  logger.debug("Executing SQL query [" + sql + "]");
 }

 class QueryStatementCallback implements StatementCallback<T>, SqlProvider {
  @Override
  public T doInStatement(Statement stmt) throws SQLException {
   ResultSet rs = null;
   try {
    rs = stmt.executeQuery(sql);
    ResultSet rsToUse = rs;
    if (nativeJdbcExtractor != null) {
     rsToUse = nativeJdbcExtractor.getNativeResultSet(rs);
    }
    return rse.extractData(rsToUse);
   }
   finally {
    JdbcUtils.closeResultSet(rs);
   }
  }
  @Override
  public String getSql() {
   return sql;
  }
 }

 return execute(new QueryStatementCallback());
}

@Override
public <T> T execute(StatementCallback<T> action) throws DataAccessException {
 Assert.notNull(action, "Callback object must not be null");

 Connection con = DataSourceUtils.getConnection(getDataSource());
 Statement stmt = null;
 try {
  Connection conToUse = con;
  if (this.nativeJdbcExtractor != null &&
    this.nativeJdbcExtractor.isNativeConnectionNecessaryForNativeStatements()) {
   conToUse = this.nativeJdbcExtractor.getNativeConnection(con);
  }
  stmt = conToUse.createStatement();
  applyStatementSettings(stmt);
  Statement stmtToUse = stmt;
  if (this.nativeJdbcExtractor != null) {
   stmtToUse = this.nativeJdbcExtractor.getNativeStatement(stmt);
  }
  T result = action.doInStatement(stmtToUse);
  handleWarnings(stmt);
  return result;
 }
 catch (SQLException ex) {
  // Release Connection early, to avoid potential connection pool deadlock
  // in the case when the exception translator hasn't been initialized yet.
  JdbcUtils.closeStatement(stmt);
  stmt = null;
  DataSourceUtils.releaseConnection(con, getDataSource());
  con = null;
  throw getExceptionTranslator().translate("StatementCallback", getSql(action), ex);
 }
 finally {
  JdbcUtils.closeStatement(stmt);
  DataSourceUtils.releaseConnection(con, getDataSource());
 }
}

åº”ç”¨ä¸¾ä¾‹äºŒï¼šsetClickListener(ï¼‰

åœ¨å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¼€å‘ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ç»å¸¸ç»™æ§ä»¶æ³¨å†Œäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ®µä»£ç ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯åœ¨Androidåº”ç”¨å¼€å‘ä¸­ï¼Œç»™Buttonæ§ä»¶çš„ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶æ³¨å†Œç›‘å¬å™¨ã€‚

Button button = (Button)findViewById(R.id.button);
button.setOnClickListener(new OnClickListener() {
  @Override
  public void onClick(View v) {
    System.out.println("I am clicked.");
  }

ä»ä»£ç ç»“æ„ä¸Šæ¥çœ‹ï¼Œäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨å¾ˆåƒå›è°ƒï¼Œå³ä¼ é€’ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼ˆonClick()ï¼‰çš„å¯¹è±¡ç»™å¦ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ã€‚ä»åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ä¸Šæ¥çœ‹ï¼Œå®ƒåˆå¾ˆåƒè§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå³äº‹å…ˆæ³¨å†Œè§‚å¯Ÿè€…ï¼ˆOnClickListenerï¼‰ï¼Œå½“ç”¨æˆ·ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå‘é€ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶ç»™è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ‰§è¡Œç›¸åº”çš„onClick()å‡½æ•°ã€‚

æˆ‘ä»¬å‰é¢è®²åˆ°ï¼Œå›è°ƒåˆ†ä¸ºåŒæ­¥å›è°ƒå’Œå¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒã€‚è¿™é‡Œçš„å›è°ƒç®—æ˜¯å¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¾€setOnClickListener()å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ³¨å†Œå¥½å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ä¹‹åï¼Œå¹¶ä¸éœ€è¦ç­‰å¾…å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œã€‚è¿™ä¹Ÿå°è¯äº†æˆ‘ä»¬å‰é¢è®²çš„ï¼Œå¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒæ¯”è¾ƒåƒè§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼ã€‚

åº”ç”¨ä¸¾ä¾‹ä¸‰ï¼šaddShutdownHook()

Hookå¯ä»¥ç¿»è¯‘æˆâ€œé’©å­â€ï¼Œé‚£å®ƒè·ŸCallbackæœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆåŒºåˆ«å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

ç½‘ä¸Šæœ‰äººè®¤ä¸ºHookå°±æ˜¯Callbackï¼Œä¸¤è€…è¯´çš„æ˜¯ä¸€å›äº‹å„¿ï¼Œåªæ˜¯è¡¨è¾¾ä¸åŒè€Œå·²ã€‚è€Œæœ‰äººè§‰å¾—Hookæ˜¯Callbackçš„ä¸€ç§åº”ç”¨ã€‚Callbackæ›´ä¾§é‡è¯­æ³•æœºåˆ¶çš„æè¿°ï¼ŒHookæ›´åŠ ä¾§é‡åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯çš„æè¿°ã€‚æˆ‘ä¸ªäººæ¯”è¾ƒè®¤å¯åé¢ä¸€ç§è¯´æ³•ã€‚ä¸è¿‡ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªä¹Ÿä¸é‡è¦ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦è§äº†ä»£ç èƒ½è®¤è¯†ï¼Œé‡åˆ°åœºæ™¯ä¼šç”¨å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

Hookæ¯”è¾ƒç»å…¸çš„åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯æ˜¯Tomcatå’ŒJVMçš„shutdown hookã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ‹¿JVMæ¥ä¸¾ä¾‹è¯´æ˜ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚JVMæä¾›äº†Runtime.addShutdownHook(Thread hook)æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ³¨å†Œä¸€ä¸ªJVMå…³é—­çš„Hookã€‚å½“åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºå…³é—­çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼ŒJVMä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨Hookä»£ç ã€‚ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

public class ShutdownHookDemo {

  private static class ShutdownHook extends Thread {
    public void run() {
      System.out.println("I am called during shutting down.");
    }
  }

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new ShutdownHook());
  }

}

æˆ‘ä»¬å†æ¥çœ‹addShutdownHook()çš„ä»£ç å®ç°ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºã€‚è¿™é‡Œæˆ‘åªç»™å‡ºäº†éƒ¨åˆ†ç›¸å…³ä»£ç ã€‚

public class Runtime {
  public void addShutdownHook(Thread hook) {
    SecurityManager sm = System.getSecurityManager();
    if (sm != null) {
      sm.checkPermission(new RuntimePermission("shutdownHooks"));
    }
    ApplicationShutdownHooks.add(hook);
  }
}

class ApplicationShutdownHooks {
    /* The set of registered hooks */
    private static IdentityHashMap<Thread, Thread> hooks;
    static {
            hooks = new IdentityHashMap<>();
        } catch (IllegalStateException e) {
            hooks = null;
        }
    }

    static synchronized void add(Thread hook) {
        if(hooks == null)
            throw new IllegalStateException("Shutdown in progress");

        if (hook.isAlive())
            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Hook already running");

        if (hooks.containsKey(hook))
            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Hook previously registered");

        hooks.put(hook, hook);
    }

    static void runHooks() {
        Collection<Thread> threads;
        synchronized(ApplicationShutdownHooks.class) {
            threads = hooks.keySet();
            hooks = null;
        }

        for (Thread hook : threads) {
            hook.start();
        }
        for (Thread hook : threads) {
            while (true) {
                try {
                    hook.join();
                    break;
                } catch (InterruptedException ignored) {
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

Hook æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šä¹Ÿæ˜¯å›è°ƒï¼Œä½†å®ƒå¾€å¾€å’Œä¸€äº›åœºæ™¯æ€§çš„è¡Œä¸ºç»‘å®šåœ¨ä¸€èµ·ã€‚åœ¨æµè§ˆå™¨ç¯å¢ƒä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ img.onload = func1 æ¥è®©å›¾ç‰‡åœ¨åŠ è½½å®Œåæ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•° func1ï¼ŒæŸç§æ„ä¹‰ä¸Šç®—æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ Hookã€‚æ­¤å¤–åœ¨ js çš„ vue æ¡†æ¶ä¸­ï¼Œä¹Ÿæä¾›äº†ç»„ä»¶ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸçš„ Hookï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ beforeDestory é’©å­å‡½æ•°ä¼šåœ¨ç»„ä»¶å³å°†è¢«é”€æ¯å‰æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå¸¸ç”¨äºé”€æ¯ä¸€äº›å½“å‰ç»„ä»¶æ‰ä¼šç”¨åˆ°çš„å®šæ—¶å™¨ã€‚

è¡¥å……ä¸€ä¸‹ResultSetExtractorç±»çš„extractDataæ–¹æ³•ä¼šå›è°ƒRowMapperç±»çš„mapRowæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™é‡ŒæŠŠResultSetè½¬æˆEntityå®ä¾‹ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æ˜¯å…·ä½“çš„ä»£ç ï¼š
public List<T> extractData(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException {
List<T> results = (this.rowsExpected > 0 ? new ArrayList<>(this.rowsExpected) : new ArrayList<>());
int rowNum = 0;
while (rs.next()) {
results.add(this.rowMapper.mapRow(rs, rowNum++));
}
return results;
}

æ–‡ä¸­çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ï¼ŒICallback æ¥å£å¯ä»¥ç”¨Runableæ¥å£æ›¿ä»£ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Java8 å‡½æ•°å¼ç¼–ç¨‹å¯ä»¥æ”¹é€ æˆï¼š
public class BClass {
public void process(Runnable processor) {
// ...
processor.run();
// ...
}
}
public class AClass {
public static void main(String[] args) {
BClass b = new BClass();
b.process(() -> System.out.println("Call back me"));
}
}
